mapper.select: select distinct m.* from SYS_MODULE M, SYS_ROLE R, SYS_ROLE_MODULE RM, SYS_ROLE_USER RU where R.ID=RM.ROLE_ID and M.ID=RM.MODULE_ID and R.ID=RU.ROLE_ID and ru.USER_ID = #{userId} order by m.orders asc

select * from v_granted_module m
and role_Code in
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (m.parent_Id = '0' or m.parent_Id is null)
and m.name like concat('%',#{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and m.status = #{module.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and m.name like concat('%',#{module.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by id asc

select SM.*, SMR.ID R_ID, SMR.MODULE_ID, SMR.RESOURCE_DESC, SMR.RESOURCE_URL, SMR.RESOURCE_TYPE from SYS_MODULE SM LEFT JOIN SYS_MODULE_RESOURCES SMR ON SM.ID = SMR.MODULE_ID
and (parent_id is null or parent_id = '0')
and parent_id = #{module.parent_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and status in(#{module.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'9999')
and name like concat('%',#{module.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by orders asc

select SM.*, SMR.ID R_ID, SMR.MODULE_ID, SMR.RESOURCE_DESC, SMR.RESOURCE_URL, SMR.RESOURCE_TYPE from sys_module SM LEFT JOIN SYS_MODULE_RESOURCES SMR ON SM.ID = SMR.MODULE_ID where parent_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by orders asc
select * from sys_module module where module.id = (select parent_Id from sys_module og where og.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by orders asc

select
ifnull(max(orders),0)
nvl(max(orders),0)
from sys_module where
parent_ID is null
parent_ID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update sys_module set status = '0001' where path_id like concat('%',#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%');

update sys_module set PATH_NAME=REPLACE(PARENT_NAME,#{oldModule.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{newModule.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), PATH=REPLACE(PATH,#{oldModule.path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{newModule.path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where path like concat('%',#{oldModule.path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and id != #{oldModule.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
